name: PirateMe
description:
Pirate themed game made at the PTBO 04 game jam! Main improvements made since the conclusion of the 32 hours are; tweaked UI, boat wake appears only when moving forward and the AI (for the most part) avoid islands!

Ionic Games is on Facebook! 

https://www.facebook.com/IonicGameDev/

Edit: Bug where you received no treasure for destroying British scum has been patched!

Edit 2: Control and balance changes. Uncapped edition allows for ridiculous power scaling on the player without any updates. (Level 15+ on any upgrade breaks balance.)
